dmca.title: iLounge Quits Lounging Around [Blogger]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Your company (Blogger.com) hosts a web site (Previews, Newz and Reviews http://newzreviews.blogspot.com/) that is currently in direct violation of the copyrights of my publishing company and web site, ILounge.com. We are therefore providing notice to you constituting "actual knowledge" of your user's copyright infringement for purposes of enforcing our rights as necessary under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, as found at 17 U.S.C. s 512(c) et seq. We are further requesting that you immediately disable access to the web site and inform the owner that he is subjecting himself, his site, and your company to liability for infringement.

As required by the D.M.C.A., I am providing the following:

(ii) Identification of the works infringed:

http://ilounge.com/index.php/news/comments/apple-sells-100-million-ipods/

(iii) Identification of the infringing materials:

http://newzreviews.blogspot.com/2007/04/apple-sells-100-millionth-ipod-ilounge.html

(iv) My contact information:

[Private], Publisher and Ownder, ILounge.com
E-mail: [Private]@iLounge.com
Address: [Private], Irvine, CA 92602
Telephone: [Private]

(v) Statement of belief

I am the owner of the content in question and possess full and exclusive rights to control its use, display, and republication. No site, including but not limited to newzreviews.blogspot.com, does not have permission to repost our content. The site is also infringing upon several copyrighted content from other well known sites such as Foxnews.com, WebMD.com and News.com.

(vi) Affirmation of accuracy

The information in this notification is accurate, and I agree that under penalty of perjury, that I am authorized to act as the owner of an exclusive right that has been infringed.

(vii) My signature as the owner of the exlusive rights in the infringed work:

[Private], Publisher and Onwer, iLounge.com
[Private]
Publisher, iLounge
[Private]@iLounge.com
http://www.iLounge.com
